nodes.text: A Viceprex was a part of the power structure of the Corporate Sector Authority, coming beneath the Direx Board. Unlike the members of that Board, everyone at the Viceprex level and below was an employee of the Corporate Sector Authority itself, rather than an employee of one of its sponsoring corporations.

There were three levels of Viceprex. An Executive Viceprex administered a division of the Authority. A Viceprex ran a subdivision of one of these divisions, and an Assistant-Viceprex was in charge of a smaller section of a division or a particular division facility.
Mirkovig Hirken was a Viceprex of Corporate Security, as well as Karrek Flim of Corporate Sector Authority.
The title of Viceprex also existed outside of the Corporate Sector as Mann Do'Kor'chok was a Viceprex for Cobalt Conglomerate.
